price: Neki od njih su nepismeni i ne poznaju Knjigu, nego samo gatke. Oni samo izmišljaju.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُمۡ أُمِّيُّونَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّآ أَمَانِيَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum ummiyyūna lā yaʿlamūna al-kitāba illā amāniyya wa-in hum illā yaẓunnūna
